channel.title: Delivery Templates on Product Manager Playbook
channel.description: Recent content in Delivery Templates on Product Manager Playbook

item.title: Product Requirements Document (PRD)
item.description: A structured template to document product requirements, aligning business goals, user needs, constraints, and delivery teams.

item.title: Backlog Refinement
item.description: A template to support effective backlog refinement, ensuring clarity, prioritization, and readiness of product work.

item.title: Sprint Goal
item.description: A template to define clear and outcome-oriented sprint goals that align team efforts and focus delivery.

item.title: Release Plan
item.description: A template to plan and communicate product releases, aligning scope, timing, risks, and stakeholders.

item.title: Retrospective
item.description: A structured template for running retrospectives that support continuous improvement, learning, and team alignment.
